scripts.pretest: mkdir -p build && node -e 'process.stdout.write("var version = \"" + require("./package.json").version + "\"; export * from \"../index\"; export {version};");' > build/bundle.js && rollup -f umd -g d3-array:d3_array -u d3-hexbin -n d3_hexbin -o build/d3-hexbin.js -- build/bundle.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-hexbin.js -c -m -o build/d3-hexbin.min.js && rm -f build/d3-hexbin.zip && zip -j build/d3-hexbin.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-hexbin.js build/d3-hexbin.min.js
